channel.title: Linux
channel.description:
Anyone know of a 3d rendering program for Linux? This stuff looks kinda cool and I'd like to get into it.
If you don't know of one, can you tell me what I should get for windows, i still haven't deleted my windows partition yet; maybe it'll give me a reason to keep it

item.title: Linux
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Blender…but I warn you, it is one of the most confusing pieces of software I have ever used.

For windows, C4D is probably the most powerful yet intuitive modelling program out there.

Read full topic
